p: The blind behavioral evaluation technique was performed for the administration of different treatments. Mice (males and females), aged about 3 months and weighing between 25 and 30 g, reared in an animal house (controlled temperature (22 ± 1°C) and a 12-hour light cycle/12 h in dark, with standard laboratory food and unlimited water) from the National Institutes of Health (NIH) Islamabad, Pakistan, were used for this test.
